DOC.brief_summary: Objective : To evaluate immediate mediate outcome endocrowns onlay ceramic restoration glass fiber pin endodontically treat teeth . Material method : A randomized control clinical trial , double-blind ( patient examiner ) conduct two trained calibrate operator perform restorative procedure . The restoration evaluate longitudinally blind calibrated examiner use USPHS . A total 34 patient randomly assign group total 68 patient . The randomization sequence generate ( www.sealedenvelope.com ) ensure confidentiality allocation , use opaque , seal numbered envelope series . These keep independent researcher moment inclusion subject . In group onlays , teeth receive fiberglass pin main root canal composite resin fill . In group endocrown , restoration fill pulp chamber . The part mill IPS e-max CAD ( Ivoclar Vivadent ) cement Multilink cementation system ( Ivoclar Vivadent ) . The immediate clinical ( focused restoration patient ) mediate ( radiographic clinical ) outcomes compare group . Survival success rate define 6 , 12 24 month .
